special_traits.name: Blood Drain
special_traits.description: When the bloodthorn viper hits a creature with its bite attack, it injects a venomous bite that deals 10 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

special_traits.name: Slippery Swimmer
special_traits.description: The bloodthorn viper has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape from grapples or restraints.
